QuestionText: What is the primary mechanism by which CRISPR-Cas9 gene editing works?
OptionA: By introducing a new gene into an organism's DNA
OptionB: By cutting the DNA at a specific location using an RNA guide
OptionC: By mutating existing genes to create new traits
OptionD: By selectively breeding organisms with desired characteristics
CorrectAnswer: By cutting the DNA at a specific location using an RNA guide
